description: Hercules on a burning pile of wood, left foot on ground and left hand on end of wood; right arm reaching up, right leg bent ; looking up
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription 

in image lower left in black: Ægid Rousselet sculp | below image in black in two columns: Hercule se iettant dans un bucher allumé sur le mont oeta. / gravé sur le tableau du Guide qui est ou cabinet du Roy / de 8 pieds de ahult er de 6 pieds de large /  
Hercules in monte oeta sese in rogum / conÿciens/ aeri oncisus ex tabula Guidi assuata in Pinacotheca Regis / 8 pedes alta 6 lata | on sheet in pencil: 2-329
title: Hercules on a Pyre
